GCD.Name: Heavy Shot
GCD.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 160.
Additional Effect: 20% chance of granting Hawk's Eye
Duration: 30s

GCD.Name: Iron Jaws
GCD.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 100.
Additional Effect: If the target is suffering from a Caustic Bite or Stormbite effect inflicted by you, the effect timer is reset
Additional Effect: 35% chance of granting Hawk's Eye
Duration: 30s

GCD.Name: Caustic Bite
GCD.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 150.
Additional Effect: Poison
Potency: 20
Duration: 45s
Additional Effect: 35% chance of granting Hawk's Eye
Duration: 30s

GCD.Name: Stormbite
GCD.Description:
Deals wind damage with a potency of 100.
Additional Effect: Wind damage over time
Potency: 25
Duration: 45s
Additional Effect: 35% chance of granting Hawk's Eye
Duration: 30s

GCD.Name: Refulgent Arrow
GCD.Description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 280.</br>Can only be executed when under the effect of Hawk's Eye.

GCD.Name: Shadowbite
GCD.Description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 170 to target and all enemies nearby it.</br>Barrage Potency: 270</br>Can only be executed when under the effect of Hawk's Eye.

GCD.Name: Burst Shot
GCD.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 220.
Additional Effect: 35% chance of granting Hawk's Eye
Duration: 30s

GCD.Name: Apex Arrow
GCD.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 120 to all enemies in a straight line before you.
Soul Voice Gauge Cost: 20
Potency increases up to 600 as Soul Voice Gauge exceeds minimum cost.
Additional Effect: Grants Blast Arrow Ready upon execution while Soul Voice Gauge is 80 or higher
Duration: 10s
Consumes Soul Voice Gauge upon execution.

GCD.Name: Ladonsbite
GCD.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 130 to all enemies in a cone before you.
Additional Effect: 35% chance of granting Hawk's Eye
Duration: 30s

GCD.Name: Blast Arrow
GCD.Description: Delivers an attack to all enemies in a straight line before you with a potency of 600 for the first enemy, and 60% less for all remaining enemies.</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Blast Arrow Ready.</br></br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.</br>※Apex Arrow changes to Blast Arrow when requirements for execution are met.

GCD.Name: Resonant Arrow
GCD.Description: Delivers an attack to target and all enemies nearby it with a potency of 600 for the first enemy, and 50% less for all remaining enemies.</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Resonant Arrow Ready.

GCD.Name: Radiant Encore
GCD.Description: Delivers an attack to target and all enemies nearby it.</br>Potency is determined by the number of different Coda consumed in the Radiant Finale executed prior, dealing full damage for the first enemy, and 50% less for all remaining enemies.</br>1 Coda: 500</br>2 Coda: 600</br>3 Coda: 900</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Radiant Encore Ready.

UnderlevelGCD.Name: Straight Shot
UnderlevelGCD.Description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 200.</br>Can only be executed when under the effect of Hawk's Eye.

UnderlevelGCD.Name: Venomous Bite
UnderlevelGCD.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 100.
Additional Effect: Venom
Potency: 15
Duration: 45s

UnderlevelGCD.Name: Quick Nock
UnderlevelGCD.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 110 to all enemies in a cone before you.
Additional Effect: 20% chance of granting Hawk's Eye
Duration: 30s

UnderlevelGCD.Name: Wide Volley
UnderlevelGCD.Description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 140 to target and all enemies nearby it.</br>Barrage Potency: 220</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Hawk's Eye.

UnderlevelGCD.Name: Windbite
UnderlevelGCD.Description:
Deals wind damage with a potency of 60.
Additional Effect: Wind damage over time
Potency: 20
Duration: 45s

OGCD.Name: Repelling Shot
OGCD.Description: Jump 10 yalms away from current target.</br>Cannot be executed while bound.

OGCD.Name: Mage's Ballad
OGCD.Description:
Grants Mage's Ballad to self and all party members within 50 yalms, increasing damage dealt by 1%.
Duration: 45s
Additional Effect: 80% chance to grant Repertoire
This effect can trigger repeatedly while singing the Mage's Ballad.
Repertoire Effect: Reduces the recast time of Heartbreak Shot and Rain of Death by 7.5s
Additional Effect: Grants Mage's Coda
Can only be executed while in combat.

OGCD.Name: The Warden's Paean
OGCD.Description:
Removes one select detrimental effect from self or target party member. If the target is not enfeebled, a barrier is created nullifying the target's next detrimental effect suffered.
Duration: 30s

OGCD.Name: Barrage
OGCD.Description:
Grants Barrage, allowing the use of Refulgent Arrow and Shadowbite. Upon execution, Refulgent Arrow will strike the selected target three times, while Shadowbite's potency will be increased to 270.
Duration: 10s
Additional Effect: Grants Resonant Arrow Ready
Duration: 30s

OGCD.Name: Army's Paeon
OGCD.Description:
Grants Army's Paeon to self and all party members within 50 yalms, increasing direct hit rate by 3%.
Duration: 45s
Additional Effect: 80% chance to grant Repertoire
This effect can trigger repeatedly while singing the Army's Paeon.
Repertoire Effect: Reduces weaponskill cast time and recast time, spell cast time and recast time, and auto-attack delay by 4%
Can be stacked up to 4 times.
Additional Effect: Grants Army's Coda
Can only be executed while in combat.

OGCD.Name: Rain of Death
OGCD.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 100 to target and all enemies nearby it.
Maximum Charges: 3
Shares a recast timer with Bloodletter.

OGCD.Name: Battle Voice
OGCD.Description:
Increases direct hit rate of self and all nearby party members by 20%.
Duration: 20s

OGCD.Name: The Wanderer's Minuet
OGCD.Description:
Grants the Wanderer's Minuet to self and all party members within 50 yalms, increasing critical hit rate by 2%.
Duration: 45s
Additional Effect: 80% chance to grant Repertoire
This effect can trigger repeatedly while singing the Wanderer's Minuet.
Repertoire Effect: Allows execution of Pitch Perfect
Can be stacked up to 3 times.
Additional Effect: Grants Wanderer's Coda
Can only be executed while in combat.

OGCD.Name: Pitch Perfect
OGCD.Description: Delivers an attack to the target and all enemies nearby it. Potency varies with number of Repertoire stacks, dealing full damage for the first enemy, and 50% less for all remaining enemies.</br>1 Repertoire Stack: 100</br>2 Repertoire Stacks: 220</br>3 Repertoire Stacks: 360</br>Can only be executed when the Wanderer's Minuet is active and you have at least one stack of Repertoire.

OGCD.Name: Empyreal Arrow
OGCD.Description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 260.

OGCD.Name: Sidewinder
OGCD.Description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 400.

OGCD.Name: Troubadour
OGCD.Description:
Reduces damage taken by self and nearby party members by 15%.
Duration: 15s
Effect cannot be stacked with machinist's Tactician or dancer's Shield Samba.

OGCD.Name: Nature's Minne
OGCD.Description:
Increases HP recovery via healing actions by 15% for self and nearby party members.
Duration: 15s

OGCD.Name: Radiant Finale
OGCD.Description:
Increases damage dealt by self and nearby party members.
Duration: 20s
Effectiveness is determined by the number of different Coda active in the Song Gauge.
1 Coda: 2%
2 Coda: 4%
3 Coda: 6%
Additional Effect: Grants Radiant Encore Ready
Duration: 30s
Can only be executed when at least 1 coda is active.

OGCD.Name: Heartbreak Shot
OGCD.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 180.
Maximum Charges: 3
Shares a recast timer with Rain of Death.

UnderlevelOGCD.Name: Bloodletter
UnderlevelOGCD.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 130.
Maximum Charges: 3
Shares a recast timer with Rain of Death.
